about_the_game:
Volleyborne: Unbound Horizons is a groundbreaking first-person volleyball game that redefines the sports gaming experience. Built for realism and immersion, Volleyborne brings every aspect of real-life volleyball to your screen with unparalleled precision and detail. From powerful spikes to insane digs, anything you can do on the court, you can do in-game.

What makes Volleyborne Different?
  • Unmatched Realism: Enjoy a game designed to mirror the physics and dynamics of actual volleyball, ensuring every move feels authentic and responsive.
  • Skill-Based Gameplay: Master the art of volleyball with input-driven mechanics that require precise control and strategy. Every action demands your skill and timing, just like in real life.
  • Fair Competition: Compete on an even playing field with no pay-to-win elements. Your success depends entirely on your abilities and tactics.
  • Immersive Experience: Dive into the most immersive sports gaming experience ever created. Smooth physics and realistic graphics make you feel like you're truly on the court
  • Intuitive Controls: Every action that requires your arms and hands is seamlessly integrated with your mouse, putting the power of professional volleyball moves at your fingertips.
.
Join the competition in Volleyborne: Unbound Horizons and prove your skills in the most authentic volleyball game ever made.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 6850 or equivalent with 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 or equivalent with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
